Thexingja

Thexingja (The-shing-ja) is a planet in Marlien, home of the Xiexio people. It is orbits the great spire Dajoxin at such a distance as to allow it to also be locked in orbit with the star Kwonyen, and possesses several moons.

The kinesis-reactive mineral Jinxi is found naturally occurring on Thexingja, its moons, and several nearby planets.
